ComicInfo.Summary:
It’s the climax of season two and even with Katie fighting alongside The Intergalactic Cross-Dimensional League of Vampblades, it’s unclear whether they’ll be enough to save Earth. One thing’s for sure, it’s going to take… all the blades!!!
Features 3 covers each with a risqué variant – including one by Dan Mendoza (Zombie Tramp, DollFace)!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Winston Young (a) & Marcelo Costa (c) | 1 | B | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Winston Young (a) & Marcelo Costa (c) | 2 | C | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Tony Fleecs | 3 | D | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Tony Fleecs | 4 | E | Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Dan Mendoza | 5 | F | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Dan Mendoza | 6 | Note: Overall issue #24.
